channel.title: Help With Making Server
channel.description:
Hey, I need help making my server work... i have been trying but it won't work... i have tried it on 2 cpu's This Computer: When I Click:RunServer/Run or when i type ipconfig on cmd this is what it says.... ' java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file...
My Other Computer:On my Vista <<<This One>>> that works... but when i do portforwording it can log on as admin and i do use defualt ip... I can log on for user but it can do the things i need to
Thanks A Lot For Your Help... If u Hep Me Out Once I Make Server I Make You Admin!!

item.title: Help With Making Server
item.dc:creator: @Goran Goran
item.description:
@Goran wrote:

I know my server ip i cant get my ipconfig and i cant run server wont work on this computer

My other computer(vista) i can log on admin for router and user account can do shit

I got d-link

Read full topic

item.description:
@ash_2oo8 wrote:

[quote=“Goran, post:1, topic:241311”]Hey, I need help making my server work… i have been trying but it won’t work… i have tried it on 2 cpu’s
This Computer: When I Click:RunServer/Run or when i type ipconfig on cmd this is what it says… ’ java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file…

My Other Computer:On my Vista <<>> that works… but when i do portforwording it can log on as admin and i do use defualt ip…
I can log on for user but it can do the things i need to

Thanks A Lot For Your Help… If u Hep Me Out Once I Make Server I Make You Admin!![/quote]

so wut u saying u wnt to make a server? or u cant get on the server ip unless u do 0.0.0.0?
